Please visit WIL website for more information."}],"credit_points_header":"12 Units of Credit","eqivalents":[],"exclusion":[],"search_title":"DDES9991 - Visualisation, Simulation, and Immersive Design Capstone","description":"

This course provides you with a capstone experience that will help you synthesise the learnings and experiential insights you have accumulated across the visualisation, simulation and immersive design program and challenge you to apply that knowledge in practical way in real world industry domains.


In developing your industry specific project, you will be required to reference the latest developments in your chosen field and where appropriate design immersive prototypes to test your ideas. The capstone will highlight your creative and collaborative problem solving skills together with your constructive and design thinking acumen.


To inform your capstone choices you will be presented with a cross section of industry issues and engage with leading edge industry partners and mentors. Your project will be tested against real world industry needs and expectations. 


","hb_assessments":[{"delivery_variation":{"cl_id":"d73567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619e9","name":"Blended in-person / online - Intensive"},"assessments":[{"individual":{"label":"Individual","value":"Individual"},"assessment_name":"Capstone Proposal","assessment_type":{"label":"Other","value":"other"},"assessment_id":"1","weighting":"25","description":"

You must submit a proposal to gain approval of your Capstone project. The project must be organised in the term before you complete the project, and must be negotiated with your tutor / course coordinator.

\n

Your plan must articulate why you have chosen this project and issue, proposed industry and/or partners, roles, timelines for development and  deadlines for delivery. Industry partners will need to be approved by your tutor and you must have full agreement from industry partners.

","learning_outcomes":[{"value":"CLO1","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO3","cl_id":"1f3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"}],"delivery_variations":[],"applies_to_all_delivery_variations":"true","cl_id":"1b3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619f5","links":[]},{"individual":{"label":"Individual","value":"Individual"},"assessment_name":"Critical Reflection","assessment_type":{"label":"Portfolio","value":"portfolio"},"assessment_id":"4","weighting":"25","description":"

Reflect upon what you have learned in relation to your own area of practice. 

","learning_outcomes":[{"value":"CLO2","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ea","key":"code"}],"delivery_variations":[],"applies_to_all_delivery_variations":"true","cl_id":"533567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619f3","links":[]},{"individual":{"label":"Individual","value":"Individual"},"assessment_name":"Progress Review","assessment_type":{"label":"Project","value":"project"},"assessment_id":"2","weighting":"10","description":"

You will present your work in progress to your tutor and discuss any challenges or issues you are facing in completing the project. Your tutor will ask questions and give you feedback to ensure that you are on track for a successful capstone project. Feedback may also be sought from your industry mentor/partners.

","learning_outcomes":[{"value":"CLO2","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ea","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO1","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO4","cl_id":"1f3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ea","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO3","cl_id":"1f3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"}],"delivery_variations":[],"applies_to_all_delivery_variations":"true","cl_id":"d33567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ed","links":[]},{"individual":{"label":"Individual","value":"Individual"},"assessment_name":"Capstone Outcomes","assessment_type":{"label":"Project","value":"project"},"assessment_id":"3","weighting":"40","description":"

You will present the outcomes of your project to your fellow students and industry mentors  in a showcase event. Your project can be either a prototype or a full design solution subject to negotiation with your tutor and industry mentor.

","learning_outcomes":[{"value":"CLO2","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ea","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO1","cl_id":"173567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO4","cl_id":"1f3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619ea","key":"code"},{"value":"CLO3","cl_id":"1f3567dbdb613c50be4672f5f39619eb","key":"code"}],"delivery_variations":[],"applies_to_all_delivery_variations":"true","cl_id":"d735a7dbdb613c50be4672f5f3961905","links":[]}]}],"inactive_course_alert":null,"timetableURL":"http://timetable.unsw.edu.au/2022/DDES9991.html","subject_sample_text_staticcontent":"To access course outline, please visit:","links":[]}

contentlets.description:
This course provides you with a capstone experience that will help you synthesise the learnings and experiential insights you have accumulated across the visualisation, simulation and immersive design program and challenge you to apply that knowledge in practical way in real world industry domains.

In developing your industry specific project, you will be required to reference the latest developments in your chosen field and where appropriate design immersive prototypes to test your ideas. The capstone will highlight your creative and collaborative problem solving skills together with your constructive and design thinking acumen.

To inform your capstone choices you will be presented with a cross section of industry issues and engage with leading edge industry partners and mentors. Your project will be tested against real world industry needs and expectations.
